Here are more info to help you to build this example:

With PMODE/W
------------

 - Copy pmodew.exe in \pmw_c

 - Run the borland make.exe

 - You can also use watcom wmake.exe with the makefile.wc file.
   Just type: wmake /f makefile.wc

With DOS4G/W
------------

 - Change the SYSTEM section to dos4g

 - Use /dUseDOS4GW_C switch instead of /dUsePMODEW_C

Make sure you are using TASM v4.0.

                                                            FreddyV/Useless
